sentences.en: Having children was the quickest way to lose your street cred.
sentences.cn: 生孩子是使自己和流行时尚脱节的最快方法。

sentences.en: The quickest way to get her off the drug was to let her go cold turkey.
sentences.cn: 要使她摆脱毒品，最快的方法是彻底戒毒。

sentences.en: Giving advice when it's not called for is the quickest way to end a good friendship.
sentences.cn: 在不需要时给予建议是了结一段友谊的最快方式。
